resources.string: When do you want to turn your ringer back on?

"Have you ever missed an important call because your ringer was off? Don't let it happen again! When this application is installed, each time you turn your ringer off you will be asked how long you would like your phone to be silent. After that period of time has passed, your ringer will be automatically turned back on."

Using Quite Time is easy! Just turn-off the ringer using the volume keys on the side of your phone.


Whenever you set your ringer to silent or vibrate, you will be prompted to enter the time at which you would like your ringer to be turned back on. If you set your phone to silent or vibrate by mistake, just turn the volume back up and the prompt will disappear.


The timer will always be initialized to the current time, so if you want to set the timer for two hours, just tap the hour + button twice.


Once the timer has been set, a notification will appear in the notification bar indicating the time remaining. You can select the notification to adjust or cancel the timer. You can also cancel the timer at any time by simply turning on the ringer using the volume keys on your phone.


If you decide you don't want to be prompted anymore, just uninstall the application.
